 * Annotation of the whole document
 * Annotation of fragments of a document
 
== Annotation of the whole document ==

=== Example 1 ===
In this example, the creator identified by the URI [http://www.hcklab.org/foaf.rdf#me] annotates a [http://www.paolociccarese.info document about himself]. _Qualifier_ is a subclass of the most generic _Annotation_ class where it is possible to associate a semantic tag to a resource or a part of it.
{{{
    <rdf:Description rdf:about="http://my.example.org/annotation/1">
    	<rdf:type rdf:resource="Qualifier"/>
    	<annotation:annotates rdf:resource="http://www.paolociccarese.info"/>
    	<pav:createdBy rdf:resource="http://www.hcklab.org/foaf.rdf#me"/>
        <pav:createdOn>2010-05-26</pav:createdOn>
    	<annotation:hasTopic rdf:resource="http://www.hcklab.org/foaf.rdf#me"/>
    </rdf:Description> 
}}}
Therefore, accessing the [http://www.hcklab.org/foaf.rdf#me foaf file], it will be possible to understand that the URI [http://www.paolociccarese.info] identifies a foaf:Document about a foaf:Person - is a foaf:Agent - with name "Paolo Ciccarese". If [http://dublincore.org/documents/dcmi-terms/ Dublin Core Terms] is preferred, the snippet will look like:
{{{
    <rdf:Description rdf:about="http://my.example.org/annotation/1">
    	<rdf:type rdf:resource="Qualifier"/>
    	<annotation:annotates rdf:resource="http://www.paolociccarese.info"/>
    	<pav:createdBy rdf:resource="http://www.hcklab.org/foaf.rdf#me"/>
        <pav:createdOn>2010-05-26</pav:createdOn>
        <dct:creator rdf:resource="http://www.hcklab.org/foaf.rdf#me"/>
        <dct:created>2005-05-01</dct:created>
    	<annotation:hasTopic rdf:resource="http://www.hcklab.org/foaf.rdf#me"/>
    </rdf:Description> 
}}}

=== Example 2 ===
In this example, the creator identified by the URI [http://www.hcklab.org/foaf.rdf#me] annotates a the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amyloid_precursor_protein Wikipedia page for the APP (Amyloid Precursor Protein)] with the [http://pir.georgetown.edu/cgi-bin/pro/entry_pro?id=PRO:000004168  Ontology (PRO) entry for APP]: 
{{{
    <rdf:Description rdf:about="http://my.example.org/annotation/2">
    	<rdf:type rdf:resource="Qualifier"/>
    	<annotation:annotates rdf:resource="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amyloid_precursor_protein"/>
    	<pav:createdBy rdf:resource="http://www.hcklab.org/foaf.rdf#me"/>
    	<annotation:hasTopic rdf:resource="http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/PRO_000004168"/>
    </rdf:Description> 
}}}
